title: FarStone DriveClone Workstation 10.02 Build 20140326 + Keymaker-
description:
================
 [INFO:]
 ================

FarStone DriveClone Workstation 10.02 Build 20140326 + Keymaker-CORE | 20.1 MB 

 DriveClone copies all contents from one original hard drive to a new hard drive or SSD (Solid State Drive) in a few simple clicks. You can use the new drive to boot your system and use your applications as if you were using your original hard drive. DriveClone is a perfect solution for transfer, movement, backup & recovery files and data from hard drives and solid state drives.

 Mirror Drive, Clone Drive and Backup Drive Made Easy!
 DriveClone makes an exact copy of disk drives, including hard drives, solid state drives(SSD), hybrid drives, & RAID drives. DriveClone will clone & copy Windows entirely, including all files/folders, applications, registries, favorites, settings, and partitions. DriveClone will resize partitions automatically when clone to different size drive. The cloned drive is immediately bootable.

 Fast & Reliable Windows and Drive Cloning Solution
 DriveClone allows you to make a mirror copy of your drive (Mirror Drive) with incremental cloning & file version backup. Mirror Drive is bootable and it keeps records of all of your files, and their historical versions. DriveClone fully supports the latest Windows 8.1, Windows 2012 Server, new hardware systems (including UEFI, GPT, & RAID computers), all sizes of drives (from 120GB to bigger than 4TB drives), and all type of drives (including eSATA/IDE/SATA/SAS), and all brands (including WD/Seagate/Fujitsu/Toshiba).

 What's New for DriveClone 10?
 Free for non-commercial use
 Convert to VMware and Hyper-v
 Incremental Drive Cloning
 Backup Up to 99 File Versions
 Mirror Drive
 Support UEFI/GPT Hardware
 Clone 2/3/4TB or Bigger Drives and RAID
 Support Windows 8.1

Key Features

 Fast and Reliable Drive & Windows Cloning
 Hard Drive to Hard Drive Cloning
 Solid State Drive Cloning
 Hard Drive to SSD Cloning
 Cloned Hard Drive is Immediately Bootable
 Clone Different Size Hard Drives and Solid State Drives
 Clone Entire Hard Drive & Windows
 Clone to Bigger or Smaller Drive
 Any Size Drive Cloning (>= 4TB drive)
 Incremental Cloning
 UEFI/GPT/RAID Cloning
 Convert to VMware & Hyper-v
 Mirror Drive

 0 Time RTO Cloning Technology

 DriveClone can create an universal bootable Mirror Drive for solely backup purpose, the Mirror Drive will be able to immediately boot on different computers for 0 time (RTO) disaster recovery.
 DriveClone is capable to clone system to a VMware or Hyper-v virtual image file. The virtual image file can be loaded & played directly in VMware and Hyper-v for 0 time (RTO) disaster recovery. 

 Smart Cloning Solution

 DriveClone will 100% defrag all sectors before writing to destination hard drive, boosts the cloned drive's performance 20% faster.
 DriveClone excludes unnecessary files from copying and cloning to destination drive, saving 10GB-70GB space.
 DriveClone keeps the cloned drive in a "Universal Bootable Format", allow it to boot on different computers; making migrate/replace new PC simple and easy.
 DriveClone allows excluding files from cloning.
 DriveClone will automatically format and partitioning the destination hard drive according to the source hard drive partition structure.
 Automatically or manually partition(s) resizing

 Powerful Cloning Solution 

 Clone Microsoft Exchange Server (with database, mailbox and email)
 Clone Microsoft SharePoint Server (with database, site and document clone)
 Clone Microsoft SQL Server (with database clone)
 Support UEFI, GPT, RAID, and > 2TB (3TB, 4TB, ...) - 100% Guaranteed
 Copy/Clone Raid system
 Copy/Clone Ultrabook Hybrid disk system 
 Copy/Clone GPT disk & Dynamic disk
 Clone/Copy Servers 2003/2008 /2012


 Platform : Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 8.1
 Language : English


 ================
 [INSTALL NOTES:]
 ================

 1. Install the program (Do not insert any key when asked during the install!)
 2. Run the program and choose "register" when registration screen pops up.
 3. You can insert anything for Name & Company. Generate serial from the keygen and paste it into that box.
 4. In the next screen choose "Other Options" (Important!)
 5. Copy your "MAC ID" to the keymaker (right into installation ID section) and click on "Activation"
 6. Copy that Activation code into the activation screen and choose "activate now". 
 7. It's all done!
 8. Enjoy!


NOTE: Keygens, patches, Activators, Cracks, Loaders etc. are always scanned with Kaspersky Internet Security 2014 Latest Version to Avoid Virus 
      issues.
